title: Brisbane Full Stack User Group: Getting Started with Vue.js + CosmosDB with EF Core
thumbnailDescription: Brisbane Full Stack User Group: Getting Started with Vue.js + CosmosDB with EF Core
eventShortDescription:
​​Brisbane Full Stack User Group: Getting Started with Vue.js + CosmosDB with EF Core 

Catch it here first! This months presenters will be giving these same presentations at NDC London 2019. Now's your chance to see it first - free - at the Brisbane Full Stack User group!​

Session 1: Getting Started with Vue.js

Let's learn the basics and see how to get started with Vue.js to succeed.

About the presenter
-------
Jason Taylor is a solution architect, trainer, mentor, and full stack developer with almost 20 years professional experience. Currently, Jason specializes in teaching and building enterprise applications utilizing .NET Core, Angular, Vue.js, and Azure. Jason loves a challenge and is skilled at progressing from a simple proposal into a well-defined, coded, and tested solution.

Session 2: Getting Started with CosmoDB with EF Core

Cosmos DB is great and awesomely fast. Wouldn't be even more amazing if we could use our beloved entity framework to manage it?

Let see how we can wire it up and get started.

About the presenter
------
Thiago Passos is passionate about technology, learning new skills and sharing what he’s learnt over the years. He's got over 15 years of experience, specially within the Microsoft stack. He’s a solution architect by day, blogger and meetup organizer by night. He’s specialized in .NET Core, Angular, Vue.js and Azure.
